title: Ovarian teratoma-associated Anti-NMDAR encephalitis in women with first-time neuropsychiatric symptoms: A meta-analysis and systematic review of reported cases
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Weronika Banach, Paulina Banach, Hanna Szweda, Andrzej Wiśniewski, Mirosław Andrusiewicz, Igor Gurynowicz, Wioletta K. Szepieniec, Paweł Szymanowski
